quote: Don't you dare call me arrogant!If ever I had any at all-which I deny!- how much could I possibly have left after having been ridden over rough-shod by you and Thomas, do you imagine?
quote_letters: DONT YOU DARE CALL ME ARROGANTIF EVER I HAD ANY AT ALL-WHICH I DENY- HOW MUCH COULD I POSSIBLY HAVE LEFT AFTER HAVING BEEN RIDDEN OVER ROUGH-SHOD BY YOU AND THOMAS DO YOU IMAGINE
